title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 2 -- G-8, Dreams and Foxy
author: Blackjack
description: Detailed analysis of the G-8 Arc including Vice Admiral Jonathan's character, comparing his pursuit of the Straw Hats to fishing and chess. Praises Jonathan as a non-villainous antagonist who is just doing his job.

title: One Piece: G-8 Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Comprehensive review of the G-8 Arc, praising it as 'renowned for its incredible writing, humor, well-balanced pacing, and the presence of compelling villains'. Considers it one of the best filler arcs in anime.

title: One Piece Diaries #25: G-8 Arc
author: COMICON Staff
description: Part of the One Piece Diaries series reviewing each arc. Discusses the G-8 Arc's unique position as beloved filler content that many fans wish was canon.

title: One Piece: This Filler Arc Had the Funniest Joke in the Entire Show
author: GameRant Staff
description: Analysis of the Condoriano joke from the G-8 Arc, explaining how Usopp and Zoro convince everyone that Inspector Shepherd is their crewmate 'Condoriano'. Discusses how this became a beloved meme in the One Piece community.

title: One Piece: Who is Condoriano from the G-8 Arc?
author: ComingSoon Staff
description: Comprehensive explanation of the Condoriano meme, including how Inspector Shepherd became 'Condoriano' and the fan theories about 'Con D. Oriano' being part of the Will of D.

title: G-8 Arc - TV Tropes Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: Detailed recap and analysis of the G-8 Arc with character breakdowns, plot summaries, and trope identification. Includes discussion of Jonathan as a 'Magnificent Bastard' antagonist.

title: 204: "The Gold and Waver Recovery Operations!"
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Episode-specific review of episode 204, discussing Usopp's leadership, the vault heist, character dynamics between Jonathan and Shepherd, and the comedic elements of the episode.

title: One Piece: 10 Best Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: DualShockers Staff
description: Ranking of One Piece filler arcs with G-8 frequently mentioned as the best filler arc due to its engaging plot, good humor, and character moments.

title: 8 Best One Piece Characters Created For The Anime, Ranked
author: GameRant Staff
description: Ranking of the best anime-original One Piece characters, likely featuring Jonathan from the G-8 Arc as one of the top entries.

title: Most Anime Wish Their Filler Was As Good As One Piece's
author: CBR Staff
description: Article discussing how One Piece's G-8 Arc represents the gold standard for filler content in anime, with many fans wishing it was canon.
